name: cheerleading
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the activity of leading the crowd in shouting encouragement and supporting a team at a sports event. The activity usually involves dancing, chanting (= repeating a word or phrase), and special gymnastic movements: Cheerleading combines a mixture of gymnastics, dance, and teamwork.
the fact of strongly supporting a particular idea or person: He continued his cheerleading for the local candidate.
